type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.javadoc.Groovydoc.Link
type.description: A Link class represent a link between groovydoc/javadoc output and url.

method.name: getPackages
method.description: Returns a list of package prefixes to be linked with an external site.

method.name: getUrl
method.description: Returns the base url for the external site.

property.name: packages
property.description: Returns a list of package prefixes to be linked with an external site.

property.name: url
property.description: Returns the base url for the external site.
